Action.author: bcbrock
Action.body: I'm not sure if this goes here, or should be a new issue, but the current Kafka orderer does not support networks of more than 1 Kafka broker. I needed to add code to my sandbox that allows the "deliver" system to discover which broker is the leader for the partition, which is required if there are multiple brokers.
